name: Snakes and ladders - vs ai - ST
name_original: Snakes and ladders - vs ai - ST
description:
Click the ▶️ button while the game is loading to run the program perfectly!

This is a single player game , it's a snakes and ladders game , you can choose 4 color for your pawn , it will automatically move when you click the start button to role the dice. Thanks for playing 😁
